ch0069_00_elitem/2702_1031_02_10:
I should’ve known that
wouldn’t go well...
ch0069_00_elitem/2702_1031_03_10:
Maybe taking it easy isn’t
such a bad idea...
ch0069_00_elitem/2702_0701_01_10: An Ace Trainer’s Pokémon must also be an ace!
ch0069_00_elitem/2702_0701_02_10:
When Slaking gives it his all, he’s strong,
but he doesn’t often give his best effort.
ch0069_00_elitem/2702_0701_03_10:
He could do it if he tried, but he doesn’t,
and it’s starting to affect me, too.
ch0069_00_elitem/2702_0702_01_10:
I mean, Slaking’s laziness is really starting to rub
off on me.
ch0069_00_elitem/2702_0702_02_10:
If things keep going like this, I’m going to turn
into an ace slacker.
ch0069_00_elitem/2702_0702_03_10:
Ah well. I guess we can always try
harder tomorrow.
ch0069_00_elitem/2703_1031_01_10:
I’m an Ace Trainer.
I’m very capable.
ch0069_00_elitem/2703_1031_02_10:
It’s OK—there’s no need
to worry.
ch0069_00_elitem/2703_0701_01_10:
I graduated from school at the top of my class,
and I’ve been an Ace Trainer ever since!
ch0069_00_elitem/2703_0701_02_10:
But all I worried about was Pokémon, so I hardly
talked to people. I’m bad at human relationships.
ch0069_00_elitem/2703_0701_03_10:
I don’t understand how people can just challenge
someone they’ve never seen before to a battle.
ch0069_00_elitem/2703_0702_01_10: I’m scared to even talk to people...
ch0069_00_elitem/2703_0702_02_10:
Then again, battling is a good way for Trainers
to get to know each other.
ch0069_00_elitem/2703_0702_03_10:
You can make friends when you have Pokémon,
which is a totally awesome thing about them,
especially for someone like me.
ch0069_00_elitem/2704_1031_02_10:
Moving faster than your
opponent is essential.
ch0069_00_elitem/2704_1031_03_10: I want to get faster, too!
ch0069_00_elitem/2704_0701_01_10:
The faster your Pokémon is, the faster your move
gauge charges!
ch0069_00_elitem/2704_0701_02_10:
So then you’re able to use more moves.
That’s why speed is so important!
ch0069_00_elitem/2704_0701_03_10:
I’ve been going running with my Pokémon to
raise my own speed.
ch0069_00_elitem/2704_0701_04_10:
I don’t really feel any different, but, uh... 
I guess I’m a lot healthier!
ch0069_00_elitem/2704_0702_01_10:
Why does your move gauge charge quickly when
your Pokémon are fast?
ch0069_00_elitem/2704_0702_02_10:
Best not to think too hard about it! 
When you’re fast, it’s good! That’s all!
